title: Defiling An RTX 4090...
description: I plug an RTX 4090 into a Cybertruck Mini PC...  Amazon Affiliate link to the RTX 4090:   Xyber Truck mini PC:   SHOP Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode!
